text:
[Verse]
Midnight sky so clear
Stars that shine so near
Dreams that come alive
Feel the night revive

[Verse 2]
City lights aglow
Feel the gentle flow
Dancing down the street
Rhythms in our feet

[Chorus]
Midnight wonders sing
Heartbeats in the spring
Nighttime symphony
Pure and wild and free

[Verse 3]
Laughter fills the air
Love is everywhere
Magic in the night
Everything feels right

[Bridge]
Whispers in the breeze
Moments like these please
Mystery so sweet
Together feels complete

[Verse 4]
Echoes of our song
Memories so strong
Underneath the moon
We will find our tune
title: Midnight Wonders
